Articles.Content: Firstly thanks to @NathanKell for this mod creation. Second thanks goes to @stratochief66 he gave me tutorial about configs and i can help. I didnt do much but its something xD. Everybody is worked hard. Sometimes they talk too much coding i dont understand. I want to be like @NathanKell in the future. Good job everybody
Is there a donate button for Nathan? He deserves some renumeration considering how many people play this.
I dont think there is any donate function. What i do is buy some copies of KSP and give em away to my friends or people on reddit.

8 minutes ago, rolls said:

Is there a donate button for Nathan? He deserves some renumeration considering how many people play this. 

He has a donate button on the OP for RSS

Many thanks to all those involved in the development of RO. I can not express in words how grateful I am to all those people who spend their time in order for others to play your favorite game. I am now studying programming, now my knowledge very weak, I hope someday in the future when I have a good knowledge, I'm just gonna be able to give people such beautiful things as you do now, guys. Good luck to you all, I wish you inspiration, a lot of money, and health. I would like to say more but English is not my native language. All the best
Just wanted to say a big thank you to everyone for making this possible! Playing small KSP is basically impossible after playing this
when is it going to be on ckan?
Yay! Thank you for release, and for all the hard work
Just gave this an install, and now my loading screen freezes on the APOLLO SM_RCS part   Anyone else having similar issues?

Thank you very much!. Thanks to collaborators too!. I know it after the TACLS update, everything was more clear.

Thanks again for this great great mod!
Is normal to stop loading game at Mark1-2pod? It always stop there after module manager patches and won't move.....Is there some fix?

I searched and in older versions was same problem:
Ah I can't wait to try this later today  Thank you to all the team!
Did you try the solution that nathan provided? The problem seemed to be a faulty install with the real fuel mod. @Toonu good job finding this!

I m trying it now...  wait a min

I ll edit this post later with result

 

Working: fix is

install RealFuels via CKAN

delete then stock RealFuels from GameData

(+ it installed via CKAN automaticaly CRP I think)

I installed via CKAN SolverEngines, RealPlume too...idk if this is needed too

Edited May 8, 2016 by Toonu

Weeeeeeeeee! Its christmas! In May!

Thanks a lot for this mod (calling it a mod is an understatement tbh).

Now waiting for CKAN...

Woot! Many thanks to everyone who contributed to RO and this epic update!

Can't wait to start a 1.1.2 RSS-RO-RP-1 campaign in a few weeks!

Woot! Many thanks to everyone who contributed to RO and this epic update!

Can't wait to start a 1.1.2 RSS-RO-RP-1 campaign in a few weeks!

Yeahh! Everybody waiting for this very long time xDD
thank you guys for your amazing work!!!!!!!!!! this is awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I feel like a kid on Christmas eve again, thanks everyone who worked on this! 

I'd much appreciate a fool-proof install via CKAN. I don't expect that to take very long?

Edit: managed to install it manually (including RP-0), but I'd feel more comfortable playing on a CKAN install

Edited May 8, 2016 by SpaceEnthusiast

hi guys, quick one for you while we wait for the CKAN release  I took the following list of related mods from a readme file I found inside the zip archive, but it seems a bit outdated - if anyone wants to help confirm if the below is accurate to install a proper manual RO set-up would be awesome

*please note most of the below version numbers are outdated

Spoiler

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:
Advanced Jet Engine by camlost (v1.6.2)
Deadly Reentry - Continued by Starwaster and NathanKell (v6.2.1)
Engine Ignitor by HoneyFox. (v3.4.1.1)
[NOTE: DO NOT install the MM files located in the "extract to use" zip files that are included.]
Ferram Aerospace Research by ferram4 (v0.14.3.2)
Module Manager by sarbian, swamp_ig, and ialdabaoth - INCLUDED (v2.5.1)
ModuleRCSFX by ialdabaoth. Updated by NathanKell - INCLUDED (v3.1)
RealChutes by stupid_chris. (v1.2.5.3)
Real Fuels by NathanKell (v8.1)
Real Solar System by NathanKell (v8.2.1)
TAC Life Support by TaranisElsu (v0.10.1)

REQUIRED FOR BEST GAMEPLAY:
Procedural Parts by swamp_ig (v0.9.19)
[NOTE: Procedural Heat Shields NOT supported at this time.]
RemoteTech 2 by Remote Technologies Group (v1.5.1) [NOTE: If you want to send data back, you need this!]
RT2 Settings File - Adds ground stations to launch sites. By CerberusRCAF
TweakScale by Biotronic (v1.44)

RECOMMENDED:
CrossFeedEnabler by NathanKell (v3.1)
Kerbal Joint Reinforcement (v2.4.4)
MechJeb by many (v2.4.0)
ModuleFixer by arsenic87. Download HERE.
PartCatalog by BlackNecro (v3.0RC8)
TextureReplacer by Shaw (v1.7.4)
or Active Texture Management by rbray89 (v3.8)
Toolbar by blizzy78 (v1.7.7)
 

 

Edited May 8, 2016 by hypervelocity

1 hour ago, SpaceEnthusiast said:

I feel like a kid on Christmas eve again, thanks everyone who worked on this! 

I'd much appreciate a fool-proof install via CKAN. I don't expect that to take very long?

 

Many of the recommended and suggested mods are outdated, but we should have at least the dependencies installed via CKAN soon enough.

Meanwhile you shouldn't have a problem installing manually. You'll need:

  • Advanced Jet Engine  (check last page for 1.1.2 compatible update)
  • Deadly Re-entry
  • Ferram Aerospace Research 
  • Kerbal Joint Reinforcement 
  • KSCSwitcher (if you're going with RSS)
  • Kopernicus (if you're going with RSS)
  • Module Manager 
  • Real Chute 
  • Real Fuels 
  • Real Heat 
  • Real Plume 
  • SmokeScreen 
  • VSR

I'm probably forgetting something. But if you install these above via CKAN, they should pull their dependencies. Then use AVC to check for the latest version of each and download/install manually.

Edited May 8, 2016 by JeeF
